title: The Last Day
description: In this Dateline classic, when Erin Corwin tells her husband she is going out to scout hiking trails in Joshua Tree National Park, she vanishes without a trace. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on December 2, 2016.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
